Key Match Events: West Indies made 179 for 4 against England in the deciding T20I
Others: The series was all square at 2-2 before the deciding match
Kieron Pollard top-scored with 41 not out
England spinners Adil Rashid, Liam Livingstone and Moeen Ali returned combined figures of four for 54
Pollard and Rovman Powell upped the tempo in an unbroken stand of 75 that included 66 off the last 24 balls
